location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, to William Newnham, Secretary to the Military Board, on 8 September 1814, and its enclosed letter sent on 7 September 1814 to Newnham by I Inverarity, Agent for Gunpowder at Bombay, regarding an order of sulphur.
